segments.text: Hello , ma ’ am . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m looking for a sweater .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What size are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ m looking for size 10 but you don ’ t have it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this one ? I think it looks terrific on you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I like the color . Can I try it on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . The fitting room is on your right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It fits well . I like it a lot . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it ’ s my favorite . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . I ’ ll take it . Thank you very much for your help .
segments.speaker: S2
